QuestData.Title: License to Ride
QuestData.Description:
The captain said you'd be coming here to pick up your mount. I hope you didn't have any problems finding the place!
Now, before you ride off into the sunset, you'll need to learn how to... well, how to ride! Luckily, we have a riding trainer right here!
Speak with Darlene Stokx when you're ready to learn how to ride.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Darlene Stokx to learn the Apprentice Riding skill.
